events.title: WINE WEDNESDAYS
descriptions: Special occasions (like Wednesdays) should always be celebrated with a glass of wine! Hop on over to Roger for 25% off any bottle of wine on our menu. Cheers!

events.title: Playing at Shoreline: DIERKS BENTLEY: BEERS ON ME TOUR
descriptions: Concerts are back at Shoreline Amphitheatre! Get tickets to the Beers on Me Tour 2021 with Dierks Bentley, Riley Green and Parker McCollum.
Make a night of it with an overnight stay at The Ameswell Hotel and dinner and drinks before the show (and more drinks after) at Roger Bar and Restaurant.
You can detox the next day with our complimentary yoga class…

events.title: YOGA ON THE LAWN
descriptions: Join us for an outdoor Hatha yoga class on our expansive outdoor lawn. You will be led through poses focused on alignment, and designed to strengthen, stretch, and balance your body to leave you feeling energized.
All levels of experience are welcome. Please bring your mat. Hotel guests may request a mat from the Front Desk. Class is complimentary. Space is limited.
Join us after class for Sunday Brunch at Roger!

events.title: WINE WEDNESDAYS
descriptions: Special occasions (like Wednesdays) should always be celebrated with a glass of wine! Hop on over to Roger for 25% off any bottle of wine on our menu. Cheers!

events.title: LIVE MUSIC WITH JIMMY ASHLEY
descriptions: Come enjoy rock and country favorites with acoustic guitarist and singer, Jimmy Ashley. Sing along to everything from Ed Sheeran and Elton John to Willie Nelson and Bob Marley over dinner and drinks at Roger.  Jimmy’s crowd-pleasing music appeals to every audience so bring your friends and family!

events.title: LIVE MUSIC WITH CARLOS REYES
descriptions:
World-renowned harpist and violinist, Carlos Reyes, is performing at Roger! This Grammy Award-winning artist has played around the globe with legendary performers like Willie Nelson, Steve Miller, MC Hammer and the Doobie Brothers.
Don’t miss this special opportunity to see Carlos perform at such an intimate venue, and prepare to be blown away by his sheer genius!

events.title: WINE WEDNESDAYS
descriptions: Special occasions (like Wednesdays) should always be celebrated with a glass of wine! Hop on over to Roger for 25% off any bottle of wine on our menu. Cheers!

events.title: YOGA ON THE LAWN
descriptions: Join us for an outdoor Hatha yoga class on our expansive outdoor lawn. You will be led through poses focused on alignment, and designed to strengthen, stretch, and balance your body to leave you feeling energized.
All levels of experience are welcome. Please bring your mat. Hotel guests may request a mat from the Front Desk. Class is complimentary. Space is limited.
Join us after class for Sunday Brunch at Roger!

events.title: LIVE MUSIC WITH MICHELLE LAMBERT
descriptions: Rising star, Michelle Lambert, brings a world of experience when she steps up to the microphone. Hailing from the Bay Area, Lambert began studying violin at age 2 and has continued making music ever since. A pop, folk and hip-hop artist whose career has taken her across the U.S. and abroad, she is influenced by her studies in Celtic music.

events.title: LIVE MUSIC WITH CARLOS REYES
descriptions:
World-renowned harpist and violinist, Carlos Reyes, is performing at Roger! This Grammy Award-winning artist has played around the globe with legendary performers like Willie Nelson, Steve Miller, MC Hammer and the Doobie Brothers.
Don’t miss this special opportunity to see Carlos perform at such an intimate venue, and prepare to be blown away by his sheer genius!

events.title: WINE WEDNESDAYS
descriptions: Special occasions (like Wednesdays) should always be celebrated with a glass of wine! Hop on over to Roger for 25% off any bottle of wine on our menu. Cheers!

events.title: LIVE MUSIC: SHE IS JULES
descriptions: San Francisco Bay-Area-born, songstress and top-liner, She Is Jules--formerly known as "JULES", has accumulated over 800K streams on Spotify alone. She is Jules' trenchant lyrics contrasted with her ethereal pop vocals, creates a safe space in her music to be especially vulnerable and much like herself; quirky.

events.title: YOGA ON THE LAWN
descriptions: Join us for an outdoor Hatha yoga class on our expansive outdoor lawn. You will be led through poses focused on alignment, and designed to strengthen, stretch, and balance your body to leave you feeling energized.
All levels of experience are welcome. Please bring your mat. Hotel guests may request a mat from the Front Desk. Class is complimentary. Space is limited.
Join us after class for Sunday Brunch at Roger!

events.title: LIVE MUSIC WITH MEGAN CHENOT
descriptions: World-traveling solo performer Megan Chenot's set list has been called "all spice, no filler" as her extraordinarily versatile voice covers favorites from the 80s, 90s, classic rock and Motown eras, and much more. Using a looping pedal on her vocals, she creates intricate live harmonies and fun arrangements of an eclectic mix of crowd-pleasers and curveballs.

events.title: LIVE MUSIC WITH CARLOS REYES
descriptions:

events.title: Playing at Shoreline: LADY A: WHAT A SONG CAN DO TOUR
descriptions: Concerts are back at Shoreline Amphitheatre! Grab your tickets to the What A Song Can Do Tour with the one and only Lady A! Go all out and make it an overnight stay at The Ameswell Hotel! Grab dinner and drinks before the show at Roger Bar and Restaurant, and join us for bottomless mimosas the morning after! Detox after brunch with our complimentary yoga class!

events.title: YOGA ON THE LAWN
descriptions: Join us for an outdoor Hatha yoga class on our expansive outdoor lawn. You will be led through poses focused on alignment, and designed to strengthen, stretch, and balance your body to leave you feeling energized.
All levels of experience are welcome. Please bring your mat. Hotel guests may request a mat from the Front Desk. Class is complimentary. Space is limited.
Join us after class for Sunday Brunch at Roger!

events.title: LIVE MUSIC WITH BRANDON PASION
descriptions: Brandon Pasion us a SF Bay Area based singer songwriter. His heart-driven lyrics and melodies call back to the timeless storytelling of country music's glory days, supported by clean, powerful vocals that reveal his jazz roots and impeccable artistry.

Don’t miss this special opportunity to see Carlos perform at such an intimate venue, and prepare to be blown away by his sheer genius!

descriptions: Concerts are back at Shoreline Amphitheatre! Grab your tickets to the When You See Yourself Tour with Kings Of Leon and Cold War Kids! Go all out and make it an overnight stay at The Ameswell Hotel! Grab dinner, drinks and enjoy a great performance from Jimmy Ashley at Roger Bar and Restaurant before the concert!

events.title: Playing at Shoreline: JASON ALDEAN: BACK IN THE SADDLE TOUR
descriptions: Concerts are back at Shoreline Amphitheatre! Grab your tickets to Jason Aldean's Back In The Saddle Tour. Go all out and make it an overnight stay at The Ameswell Hotel. Grab dinner and drinks before the show at Roger Bar and Restaurant, and join us for brunch the morning after!

events.title: Playing at Shoreline: PITBULL: I FEEL GOOD TOUR
descriptions: Concerts are back at Shoreline Amphitheatre! Grab your tickets to the I Feel Good Tour with Pitbull and Iggy Azalea! Go all out and make it an overnight stay at The Ameswell Hotel! Grab dinner, drinks and feel good Roger Bar and Restaurant before the concert!

events.title: G.O.A.T Fuel Dinner Benefitting Do It For The Love
descriptions: You are cordially invited to a private dinner and silent auction by G.O.A.T Fuel and The Ameswell Hotel benefitting Michael and Sara Franti's non-profit, Do It For The Love.
Evening includes a silent auction, cocktail reception sponsored by Bacardi and Tansy wines and a 3-course dinner, along with some surprises you don't want to miss!
- MC: Hooman Khalili from 97.3 Radio Alice
- Speaker Panel: NFL Hall of Famer Jerry Rice, VC Legend Chris Kelly and Friends
- Special Guests: Sara and Michael Franti
Tickets: $250 pp ($150 is tax deductible)
Please show proof of vaccination or a negative Covid test result at check-in.

events.title: Playing at Shoreline: BRAD PAISLEY: 2021 TOUR
descriptions: Description: Concerts are back at Shoreline Amphitheatre! Grab your tickets to Brad Paisley's 2021 Tour. Go all out and make it an overnight stay at The Ameswell Hotel. Grab dinner and drinks before the show at Roger Bar and Restaurant, and join us for brunch the morning after!

events.title: G.O.A.T Fuel Wellness Day Benefitting Do It For The Love
descriptions: Join us for a wellness day of family-friendly fun and games on 'The Field' at The Ameswell Hotel with the team from G.O.A.T. Fuel, Jerry Rice’s health-focused energy drink.
Proceeds from the event will benefit Sara and Michael Franti's nonprofit, Do It For The Love.
Football Toss with the G.O.A.T. Fuel Team
Goat Yoga
Lawn Games: Cornhole, Hula Hoops, Bocce Ball, Connect Four and More
Juice Beauty Skincare Products
Team Fitnesse
Rejuv Spa
General admission $20 for adults and $10 for kids. Goat Yoga $45, includes general admission.

events.title: Playing at Shoreline: MAROON 5 AND MEGHAN TRAINOR TOUR
descriptions: Concerts are back at Shoreline Amphitheatre! Grab your tickets to the Maroon 5 and Meghan Trainor Tour! Go all out and make it an overnight stay at The Ameswell Hotel. Grab dinner and drinks before the show at Roger Bar and Restaurant!

events.title: Playing at Shoreline: LUKE BRYAN: PROUD TO BE RIGHT HERE TOUR
descriptions: Concerts are back at Shoreline Amphitheatre! Grab your tickets to the Maroon 5 and Meghan Trainor Tour! Go all out and make it an overnight stay at The Ameswell Hotel. Grab dinner and drinks before the show at Roger Bar and Restaurant, and join us for brunch the morning after!

events.title: Playing at Shoreline: THE DOOBIE BROTHERS 50TH ANNIVERSARY WITH MICHAEL MCDONALD
descriptions: Concerts are back at Shoreline Amphitheatre! Grab your tickets to the Maroon 5 and Meghan Trainor Tour! Go all out and make it an overnight stay at The Ameswell Hotel. Grab dinner and drinks before the show at Roger Bar and Restaurant!

events.title: Playing at Shoreline: OUTLAW MUSIC FESTIVAL
descriptions: Concerts are back at Shoreline Amphitheatre! Grab your tickets to a day full of festivities at the Outlaw Music Festival featuring a jam-packed lineup with artists such as Willie Nelson, The Avett Brothers, Chris Stapleton and more. Go all out and make it an overnight stay at The Ameswell Hotel. Grab dinner and drinks before the show at Roger Bar and Restaurant, and join us for brunch the morning after!

All levels of experience are welcome. Please bring your mat. Hotel guests may request a mat from the Front Desk. Class is complimentary. Space is limited.
Join us after class for Sunday Brunch at Roger!

events.title: Mountain View Farmers' Market
descriptions: Shop local and enjoy a variety of culinary goods and artisans from vendors near and far every Sunday in downtown Mountain View. Wind down from all the walking and head over to Roger Bar and Restaurant for bottomless mimosas and Dutch Baby pancakes!

Don’t miss this special opportunity to see Carlos perform at such an intimate venue, and prepare to be blown away by his sheer genius!

events.title: FREDDY CLARKE AND WOBBLY WORLD
descriptions: Bay Area Legend, Freddy Clarke is performing with members of his band, Wobbly World during dinner at Roger!  Freddy brings together a group of internationally recognized musician for an ethno-layering of melodic and rhythmic blend of several different world traditions to create a brilliant new sound.

events.title: California's Great America Halloween Haunt
descriptions: Grab your Oktoberfest attire and head over to the Oktobermixer in Open Space at The Ameswell Hotel hosted by DTCP, Deutsche Telekom, Bosch Venture Capital, and Munich Re Ventures. Need a place to wind down? Head over to the Roger Bar and Restaurant for a round of desserts!

descriptions: Broadway shows are back at the San Jose Center for the Performing Arts! Sing along and witness great performances all October from the cast of Hamilton on selected dates. Grab a bite to eat for lunch or dinner, depending on your show time, before the curtain call!

events.title: FRIGHT NIGHT AT THE AMESWELL HOTEL
descriptions: Come and join us for a spooky Saturday night movie! Bring a blanket, family, friends, even the dog! Show up starting at 4 PM for lawn games and Halloween cocktails and movie treats out of our retro Airstream bar. Tickets include a 10% discount at Roger, our bar & restaurant (limit one per party, show eventbrite ticket to redeem.)

events.title: YOGA ON THE LAWN
descriptions: Join us for an outdoor Hatha yoga class on our expansive outdoor lawn. You will be led through poses focused on alignment, and designed to strengthen, stretch, and balance your body to leave you feeling energized.
All levels of experience are welcome. Please bring your mat. Hotel guests may request a mat from the Front Desk. Class is complimentary. Space is limited.
Join us after class for Sunday Brunch at Roger!

events.title: Mountain View Farmers' Market
descriptions: Shop local and enjoy a variety of culinary goods and artisans from vendors near and far every Sunday in downtown Mountain View. Wind down from all the walking and head over to Roger Bar and Restaurant for bottomless mimosas and Dutch Baby pancakes!

events.title: HAMILTON ON BROADWAY
descriptions: Broadway shows are back at the San Jose Center for the Performing Arts! Sing along and witness great performances all October from the cast of Hamilton on selected dates. Grab a bite to eat for lunch or dinner, depending on your show time, before the curtain call!

events.title: California's Great America Halloween Haunt
descriptions: Grab your Oktoberfest attire and head over to the Oktobermixer in Open Space at The Ameswell Hotel hosted by DTCP, Deutsche Telekom, Bosch Venture Capital, and Munich Re Ventures. Need a place to wind down? Head over to the Roger Bar and Restaurant for a round of desserts!

events.title: Downtown Mountain View - Food & Wine Walk on Castro Street
descriptions: Get your grub on at the Food & Wine Walk on Castro Street in downtown Mountain View! Explore dozens of cuisines on the Castro strip. Finish your tour off at the Roger Bar and Restaurant for desserts, such as our soft and warm dulce de leche cinnamon dougnuts!

events.title: HAIRSPRAY ON BROADWAY
descriptions: Broadway shows are back at the San Jose Center for the Performing Arts! Sing along and witness great performances all November from the cast of Hairspray on selected dates. Grab a bite to eat for lunch or dinner, depending on your show time, before the curtain call!

events.title: HAIRSPRAY ON BROADWAY
descriptions: Broadway shows are back at the San Jose Center for the Performing Arts! Sing along and witness great performances all November from the cast of Hairspray on selected dates. Grab a bite to eat for lunch or dinner, depending on your show time, before the curtain call!

events.title: HAIRSPRAY ON BROADWAY
descriptions: Come enjoy rock and country favorites with acoustic guitarist and singer, Jimmy Ashley. Sing along to everything from Ed Sheeran and Elton John to Willie Nelson and Bob Marley over dinner and drinks at Roger.  Jimmy’s crowd-pleasing music appeals to every audience so bring your friends and family!

events.title: HAIRSPRAY ON BROADWAY
descriptions: Broadway shows are back at the San Jose Center for the Performing Arts! Sing along and witness great performances all November from the cast of Hairspray on selected dates. Grab a bite to eat for lunch or dinner, depending on your show time, before the curtain call!

events.title: HAIRSPRAY ON BROADWAY
descriptions: Broadway shows are back at the San Jose Center for the Performing Arts! Sing along and witness great performances all November from the cast of Hairspray on selected dates. Grab a bite to eat for lunch or dinner, depending on your show time, before the curtain call!

events.title: LIVE MUSIC WITH MEGAN CHENOT
descriptions: World-traveling solo performer Megan Chenot's set list has been called "all spice, no filler" as her extraordinarily versatile voice covers favorites from the 80s, 90s, classic rock and Motown eras, and much more. Using a looping pedal on her vocals, she creates intricate live harmonies and fun arrangements of an eclectic mix of crowd-pleasers and curveballs.

events.title: LIVE MUSIC WITH CARLOS REYES
descriptions:
World-renowned harpist and violinist, Carlos Reyes, is performing at Roger! This Grammy Award-winning artist has played around the globe with legendary performers like Willie Nelson, Steve Miller, MC Hammer and the Doobie Brothers.
Don’t miss this special opportunity to see Carlos perform at such an intimate venue, and prepare to be blown away by his sheer genius!

events.title: WINE WEDNESDAYS
descriptions: Special occasions (like Wednesdays) should always be celebrated with a glass of wine! Hop on over to Roger for 25% off any bottle of wine on our menu. Cheers!

events.title: FREDDY CLARKE AND WOBBLY WORLD
descriptions: Bay Area Legend, Freddy Clarke is performing with members of his band, Wobbly World during dinner at Roger!  Freddy brings together a group of internationally recognized musician for an ethno-layering of melodic and rhythmic blend of several different world traditions to create a brilliant new sound.

events.title: THANKSGIVING DINNER AT ROGER
descriptions: Join the Roger family for a delightfully modern Thanksgiving dinner. We will be offering a three course pre-fixe at 95/head (35 for children 12 and under), featuring the classics you know and love and few delicious autumnal twists on our Roger staples. The menu is viewable on our website, www.rogerbarandrestaurant.com. Come give thanks with us!

events.title: JINGLE BALL MOVIE NIGHT
descriptions: Join us at the Ameswell Hotel for a holiday movie night! We'll be showing Elf (Santa! I know him!) and serving warm and toasty drinks + seasonal treats out of our Airstream bar.  Bring the whole family (plus the dog!) and snuggle up on a blanket on our lawn near our electric heaters. Our Airstream bar will be open at 2:00 PM and we'll be selling DIY holiday cookie decorating kits. The movie will begin at 5:00 PM - join us for dinner at Roger Bar & Restaurant afterwards!

events.title: NEW YEARS' EVE AT ROGER
descriptions: Come enjoy the Roger menu classics, plus a few New Years' specials  - oysters, caviar and sparkling wine guarantee to make it an evening to remember. After dinner, grab one of our signature cocktails and get your groove on with a disco-themed playlist that we'll be playing 'til midnight!
